name: Sara Fumagalli
subtitle: Oncology Nucleus Lead @Bayer
about: I have been working at Bayer for several years and have had different roles - from clinical trials management to P&L responsible.  I am lucky to have been able to learn so much and act in such different fields.Today I am responsible for the launch and management of Bayer's oncology products. I am a proud member of the Bayer Pharma Leadership team. I care about our mission "Health for all, hunger for none".
experiences:
Accountable for the launch and commercialization of Bayer Oncology drugs. Lead of the agile cross-functional team. Responsible for the portfolio P&L. 
Proud member of Bayer Pharma Leadership team.

In the oncology field, the main areas covered are gastrointestinal and genitourinary, with focus on the new frontiers of agnostic drugs.
Responsible for the definition and implementation of strategies in the short, medium and long term for the Oncology BU products. Lead of the marketing team.
Member of the Oncology Business Unit leadership team.
Product Owner - Lead of the agile oncology launch team

Lead the agile launch team (two products in launch phase), a costumer centric cross-functional organization aiming clear and shared business objectives, promoting the culture of responsibility, adaptability, courage, and respect.
The team works closely as per scrum framework and includes customer-facing roles (marketing, medical, sales, market access) and non-customer-facing roles (market research, multichannel, regulatory) that take 360¬∞ responsibility for the product.

Our new operating model "Dynamic Shared Ownership" will not only make Bayer as an organization more agile, leaner and more effective, thus significantly increasing the value for our patients, farmers and customers. hashtag#DSO also promises a host of exciting innovations for the talents in hashtag#TeamBayer. At its core, DSO is about enabling everyone to contribute their strengths, passions and skills exactly where they are needed most and where they will have the greatest impact in line with our mission "Health for all, Hunger for none". The new Talent Marketplace that we are currently working on in HR will make this possible - overcoming rigid structures, one-dimensional job descriptions and performance evaluation by a single line manager.  I was very pleased to be able to present these great benefits last Friday together with our CEO Bill Anderson, our Chief Catalyst Michael Lurie, Sebastian Guth, President of Bayer and Bayer | Pharmaceuticals in the US, and other inspiring speakers in a webinar to around 50 journalists from leading international business media.
